strings.Value: [Talk to the old people] "Who are you?"
[Talk to the young man] "So who are you, and what are you doing here?"
"I've inspected the area and I'm ready to report my findings."
"I'll go and see what I can find."
"I've explored the area and found nothing strange. It seems to be a regular inn."
{n}Three people are sitting at a table in a tense silence, an old couple and a young man. They turn to you suddenly, making little effort to conceal their dismay.{/n}
"Good afternoon! Am I interrupting something?"
"Em... No, no, not at all! Welcome, dear guests, please sit down! How can we help you? Would you like to have dinner? Or maybe a room for the night?"
"Make sure not to order any meat. I heard it's... strange here."
"I'm afraid we don't have any meat, only cabbage soup. And bread – but the bread is fresh!"
"Are you sure you're all right?"
"Well, have you looked around? Have you found anything?"
"Yes, yes, of course! Don't worry about a thing!"

"Then I suppose you won't mind if my people take a look around your inn? By the way, I forgot to introduce myself. Maegar Varn – the baron of these lands. I've heard rumor that guests at your inn are treated rather badly. But surely this must be idle gossip?"
{n}The old man looks at the old woman, then you, and then turns his eyes back to Maegar.{/n} "Em... Yes, yes, of course! Please look around! I assure you, everything here is in order!"

{n}Maegar turns to you and winks surreptitiously.{/n} "Cephal and I will remain here just in case, to keep an eye on everyone. You have a look around. And if you have any questions, I'm sure our dear hosts will be happy to answer them."
"I am Mytko, Mytko Bragic, and this is my wife, Kalina. We came from... em... Brevoy. Wanted to move someplace new. And we opened this inn..."

"I'm Yorgesh, a simple merchant from {g|Restov}Restov{/g}. I'm on my way to {g|Galt}Galt{/g} to trade... I've been here before, and never had any problems. The beds are warm, the food is good, and the roof doesn't leak!"
"Great! Let's hear what my people managed to find out!"
"Right, there are lots of passers-by here, settlers, merchants... And we thought an inn by a ford would be sure to have a regular flow of guests!"
"And treating our guests badly? Why, that's slander, I swear by all the gods! We... em... We value our reputation!"
"Keep your eyes peeled – any evidence might be important!"
{n}The old people exchange nervous glances.{/n}
"Really? Well then, forgive us for the intrusion, dear hosts. Thank you for your hospitality. We have to go."
